Each share is represented by a Restricted Stock Unit ("RSU"). The RSUs will vest in equal quarterly increments over a one year period, subject to the Reporting Person's continued service as of each such date. The reported securities are held of record by the Chandna Family Revocable Trust DTD 4/13/98 for which the Reporting Person serves as a trustee.
